an10.99:2.1: Durabhisambhavāni hi kho → durabhisambhavāni kho (bj, pts1)
an10.99:2.6: uplavissati vā’ti → uppilavissati vā (bj, s1-3, pts1)
an10.99:6.2: vaṅkakaṃ → vaṅkaṃ (si, pts1), ciṅgulakaṃ → piṅgulikaṃ (s1-3) | ciṅkulakaṃ (mr)
an10.99:8.1: Idha kho pana vo → idaṃ padaṃ s1-3 potthakesu natthi; voti nipātamattaṃ (aṭṭha.)
